com.cs421.rccar.Util
Class BluetoothReceiver

java.lang.Object
  com.cs421.rccar.Util.BluetoothReceiver

public class BluetoothReceiver
extends java.lang.Object

Handles Bluetooth communication between two paired Bluetooth devices by using a BluetoothCommunicationService object. Allows messages to be sent and received using thread-safe operations

Author:
David Widen, Thomas Cheng, Jessie Young
